A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While there were some minor flaws in a few areas mostly involving pacing and over-used chase elements like objects that made me go \"shouldn't they have just got knocked off of the thing they're riding?\" I enjoyed this film immensely. I went in with\, as usual\, no expectations\, and was pleasantly surprised. The story was surprising\, and I was happy with the result. I recommend it
